เคฏเคนเคพเค เคชเคนเคฒเฅ เคฌเคพเคฐ เคเคฏเคพ เคเคฐ เคธเฅเคตเคพ เคธเฅ เคฒเฅเคเคฐ เคเคพเคจเฅ เคคเค, เคธเคฌ เคเฅเค เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพ!! เคเคเคฐ เคเคช เคนเฅเคฐเฅเคฒเฅเคกเฅเคธ เคธเฅ เคชเคฐเคฟเคเคฟเคค เคนเฅเค, เคคเฅ เคเคช เคเคพเคจเคคเฅ เคนเฅ เคนเฅเคเคเฅ เคเคฟ เคนเคฐ เคเค เคเคฒเค เคนเฅเคคเคพ เคนเฅเฅค เคฏเคน เคตเคพเคฒเคพ เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพเฅค เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคนเคฐ เคเฅเคเคผ เคชเคฐ เคคเฅเคเฅ เคธเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคธเคพเคฅ 4 เคตเคฟเคเค เคตเคพเคฒเคพ เคกเคฟเคจเคฐ เคฎเคฟเคฒเคพเฅค เคฌเคธ เคฅเฅเคกเคผเฅ เคธเฅ เคฆเคฟเคเฅเคเคค เคฏเคน เคฅเฅ เคเคฟ เคเฅเคฒเคธเฅเคฒเฅ เคฅเฅเคกเคผเคพ เคฐเคธเฅเคฒเคพ เคฅเคพ, เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคซเคฟเคฐ เคญเฅ เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพ!! เคเคเคฐ เคเคช เคเคธ เคเคฒเคพเคเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคนเฅเค, เคคเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคเคชเคเฅ เคฏเคนเคพเค เคฐเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเคพ เคธเฅเคเคพเคต เคฆเฅเคเคเคพเฅค

เคนเคฐ เคเฅเค เคนเฅเคฐเฅเคฒเฅเคกเฅเคธ เคเคฟเคเคจ เคเฅ เคฌเคพเคฐเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฌเคพเคค เคเคฐเคคเคพ เคฐเคนเคคเคพ เคนเฅ! เคเคธเคฒเคฟเค เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเฅเคฆ เคเคพเคเคฐ เคฆเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเคพ เคธเฅเคเคพเฅค เคฎเฅเค เคเคชเคจเฅ เคเฅเค เคฆเฅเคธเฅเคคเฅเค เคเฅ เคธเคพเคฅ เคตเคนเคพเค เคเคฏเคพเฅค เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคฎเคพเคเคฒเฅเคก เคธเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคธเคพเคฅ 6 เคชเฅเคธ เคเคฟเคเคจ เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคเคฐ เคฒเฅเคฎเคจ เคชเฅเคชเคฐ เคธเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคธเคพเคฅ 4 เคชเฅเคธ เคเคฟเคเคจ เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคเคฐเฅเคกเคฐ เคเคฟเคเฅค เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคเคเฅเคเฅ เคธเฅ เคซเฅเคฐเคพเค เคเคฐเคจเฅ เคเฅ เคฒเคฟเค เคเคนเคพ เคฅเคพ, เคเคฐ เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคตเคพเคเค เคฌเคนเฅเคค เคเคเฅเคเฅ เคฅเฅเฅค เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคซเฅเคฐเฅเคเค เคซเฅเคฐเคพเคเคเคผ เคญเฅ เคเฅเคฐเคพเค เคเคฟเคเฅค เคตเฅ เคเฅเค-เคเคพเค เคฅเฅเฅค เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคเฅเคฒ เคฎเคฟเคฒเคพเคเคฐ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฒเคเคพ เคเคฟ เคฎเฅเค เคตเคนเคพเค เคเคฏเคพเฅค เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคธเฅเคตเคพเคฆเคฟเคทเฅเค เคฅเฅ!!

เคฎเฅเค เคฏเคนเคพเค เคเค เคเฅเคจเฅเคกเคฟเคฏเคจ เคนเฅเคเฅค เคนเฅเคฐเฅเคฒเฅเคกเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคฌเคพเคฐเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฌเคนเฅเคค เคเคเฅเคเฅ เคฌเคพเคคเฅเค เคธเฅเคจเฅ เคนเฅเคเฅค :(
เคเคฟเคเคจ เคจเคฎเคเฅเคจ เคฅเคพเฅค :( เคฒเคฟเคตเคฐ เคฌเคนเฅเคค เคฒเคฟเคตเคฐเฅ เคตเคพเคฒเคพ เคฅเคพ (เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคฒเคฟเคตเคฐ เคชเคธเคเคฆ เคจเคนเฅเค เคนเฅ, เคเคธเคฒเคฟเค เคฎเฅเคฐเฅ 3 เคธเฅเคเคพเคฐ เคธเคฟเคฐเฅเคซเคผ เคเคฟเคเคจ, เคซเฅเคฐเคพเคเคเคผ เคเคฐ เคเฅเค เคซเคผเคฟเคถ เคเฅ เคฒเคฟเค เคนเฅเค) เคซเฅเคฐเคพเคเคเคผ เคเคพเคจเฅ เคฒเคพเคฏเค เคฅเฅเฅค เคเฅเค เคซเคผเคฟเคถ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคฌเคนเฅเคค เคชเคธเคเคฆ เคเค!
เคนเคฎเคพเคฐเคพ เคเคพเคจเคพ เคเคจเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฒเคเคญเค 30 เคฎเคฟเคจเค เคธเฅ เคเคผเฅเคฏเคพเคฆเคพ เคฒเค เคเค... เคฎเฅเค เคเคพเคกเคผเฅ เคเคฒเคพเคเคฐ เคตเคนเคพเค เคเคฏเคพเฅค (เคเฅ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคธเคฎเค เคจเคนเฅเค เคเคฏเคพ เคเฅเคฏเฅเคเคเคฟ เคกเฅเคฐเคกเฅเคถ เคเคนเคคเคพ เคนเฅ เคเคฟ เคเคชเคเฅ เคฏเคน 10 เคฎเคฟเคจเค เคฎเฅเค เคฎเคฟเคฒ เคเคพเคเคเคพ?)
เคเคฟเคธ เคตเฅเคฏเคเฅเคคเคฟ เคจเฅ เคนเคฎเคพเคฐเคพ เคเคฐเฅเคกเคฐ เคฒเคฟเคฏเคพ, เคตเคน เคฎเคฟเคฒเคจเคธเคพเคฐ เคเคฐ เคฎเคฆเคฆเคเคพเคฐ เคฅเคพเฅค
๐ข

เคฎเฅเค เคนเฅเคฐเฅเคฒเฅเคกเฅเคธ เคเคฟเคเคจ เคเคพเคเคฐ เคฌเคกเคผเคพ เคนเฅเค เคนเฅเคเฅค เคฏเคน เคฎเฅเคฐเฅ เคชเคฐเคฟเคตเคพเคฐ เคฎเฅเค เคนเคฎเฅเคถเคพ เคธเฅ เคชเคธเคเคฆเฅเคฆเคพ เคฐเคนเคพ เคนเฅเฅค เคนเคพเคฒเคพเคเคเคฟ, เคเค เคเคตเคพเคจเฅเคธเฅเคเคจ เคนเฅเคตเคฐเฅเคก เคฎเฅเค เคเคฐเฅเคกเคฐ เคเคฐเคจเคพ เคเค เคฆเฅเคฐเฅเคญเคพเคเฅเคฏเคชเฅเคฐเฅเคฃ เคเคจเฅเคญเคต เคฅเคพเฅค เคฐเคธเฅเคเคฏเคพ เคเคงเฅ เคเคเคเฅ เคฆเฅเคฐ เคธเฅ เคเคฏเคพเฅค เคเคเคฟเคฐเคเคพเคฐ, เคเคฌ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคฎเฅเคฐเฅ 6 เคตเคฟเคเคเฅเคธ เคเคฐ เคซเฅเคฐเคพเคเคเคผ เคฎเคฟเคฒเฅ, เคคเฅ เคเคจเคฎเฅเค เคธเฅ เคเค เคตเคฟเคเค เคชเฅเคฐเฅ เคคเคฐเคน เคธเฅ เคเคพเคฒเคพ เคฅเคพ! เคเคฒเคพ เคจเคนเฅเค, เคฌเคฒเฅเคเคฟ เคเคพเคฒเคพ!! เคเคคเคฐเคจเคพเค เคเคฐ เคฌเฅเคฎเคพเคฐ เคฒเค เคฐเคนเคพ เคฅเคพ! เคเคธเคจเฅ เคฎเฅเคฐเฅ เคฌเคพเคเฅ เคเคพเคจเฅ เคเคพ เคธเคพเคฐเคพ เคฎเคเคผเคพ เคเคฟเคฐเคเคฟเคฐเคพ เคเคฐ เคฆเคฟเคฏเคพเฅค เคฎเฅเค เคฏเคน เคญเฅ เคฌเคคเคพเคจเคพ เคเคพเคนเคคเคพ เคนเฅเค เคเคฟ เคเคฟเคธ เคเคเฅเคเฅ เคฏเฅเคตเคคเฅ เคจเฅ เคฎเฅเคฐเคพ เคเคฐเฅเคกเคฐ เคฒเคฟเคฏเคพ เคเคฐ เคฎเฅเคฐเฅ เคเคพเคจเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฎเคธเคพเคฒเฅ เคกเคพเคฒเฅ, เคตเคน เคฌเคนเฅเคค เคเคเฅเคเฅ เคฅเฅ! เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเคพเคฒเคพ เคตเคฟเคเค เคตเคพเคชเคธ เคจเคนเฅเค เคฒเคฟเคฏเคพ เคเฅเคฏเฅเคเคเคฟ (เคฎเคพเคจ เคฒเฅเคเคฟเค) เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคฏเคเฅเคจ เคนเฅ เคเคฟ เคเคจเฅเคนเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเฅเคฐเคพเคนเค-เคเคจเฅเคเฅเคฒ เคเคชเคพเคฏ เคจเคนเฅเค เคธเฅเคเคพเคฏเคพ เคนเฅเคคเคพเฅค เคฏเคน เคฐเฅเคธเฅเคเฅเคฐเฅเคเค เคฎเฅเค เคฒเคเฅ เคธเคญเฅ เคนเคธเฅเคคเคฒเคฟเคเคฟเคค เคธเคเคเฅเคคเฅเค เคธเฅ เคชเฅเคฐเคฎเคพเคฃเคฟเคค เคนเฅเคคเคพ เคนเฅ (เคเคฐเฅเคฅเคพเคค, เคเคพเคจเฅ เคธเฅ เคชเคนเคฒเฅ เคเคชเคจเคพ เคเคพเคจเคพ เคเคผเคฐเฅเคฐ เคเคพเคเค เคฒเฅเค...)เฅค เคฎเฅเค เคเคธ เคฌเคพเคฐ เคเฅ เคฏเคพเคคเฅเคฐเคพ เคธเฅ เคเฅเคถ เคจเคนเฅเค เคฅเคพเฅค เคเคเคฐ เคเคเคฒเฅ เคฌเคพเคฐ เคเคเคเคเคพ, เคคเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฌเฅเค เคเฅเคฒเคเคฐ เคนเคฐ เคเฅเคเคผ เคเฅ เคเคพเคเค เคเคฐเฅเคเคเคพ!!! reviews: Normally I can order my food and pick it up without a problem but today when I went to pick up my order, I tried to tell one of the women, looks to be in her 40s, that I made an order and when I said my name, she ignored me and started calling numbers from 62 to 67, and then another woman walks up and said she called in an order, now another woman in the back gets her food and Iโm trying to get mine after her but the older woman just calling numbers, still ignoring me. I finally tell the younger woman I ordered through grub hub and I tell her my name like I told the other woman and she gets my food for me. I donโt know what the older ladyโs problem was but she needs to get better customer service skills or stop working the register. It doesnโt take a lot just to learn to listen  and stop ignoring people especially when theyโre not disrespectful. I wonโt be coming back here ever again.

Great tasting chicken but, damn do the employees have to pay for sauce out of pocket? This chicken is way too dry for the price!! Also, if you ask for more sauce they force you to buy extra in a cup which is not the same and defeats the purpose of adding sauce while the food is hot! Iโm giving a 1 star because, this is not how original Haroldโs is served!

Not going to lie I gave up on this Haroldโs years ago because the food quality and service had fallen off. But today I decided to give it another chance and ordered 15 wings. The line was long but they were moving people in and out quick. And honestlyโฆ they made a comeback. The chicken was fye, fresh, and crunchy just how I like it. Even my 5-year-old said Mama this chicken fye

I ordered a fourth white with just lemon pepper I received what looked like a fried rat with a bunch of sauce ,this Harolds has went really down and when you try to call, they donโt pick up the phone. I wouldnโt recommend this place at all.
So delicious!! Fresh, hot nice size wings, good amount mild size
El pollo tiene muy buen sabor, buen precio y de domingo a miรฉrcoles tienen el especial de 1/2 pollo por 5.25
La empleada le tratรณ con discriminaciรณn  muy mala atenciรณn  no vengo maa nunca aca
Una hora para que me den la comida
Cerrado por licencia suspendida

Karaniwan ay nakakapag-order ako ng pagkain at nakukuha ko ito nang walang problema. Pero ngayon, noong kukunin ko na ang order ko, sinubukan kong sabihin sa isa sa mga babae, na mukhang nasa edad 40, na may order ako. Nang sabihin ko ang pangalan ko, hindi niya ako pinansin at tinawagan ang mga numero mula 62 hanggang 67. May lumapit na isa pang babae at sinabing tinawag niya ang order. Ngayon, may isa pang babae sa likod na kumuha ng pagkain niya at sinusubukan kong kunin ang akin, pero tumatawag lang ang matandang babae ng numero, hindi pa rin ako pinapansin. Sa wakas, sinabi ko sa nakababatang babae na umorder ako gamit ang grub hub at sinabi ko sa kanya ang pangalan ko tulad ng sinabi ko sa isa pang babae at siya ang kumuha ng pagkain ko. Hindi ko alam kung ano ang problema ng matandang babae pero kailangan niyang pagbutihin ang customer service skills o tumigil na sa pagiging matino. Hindi naman kailangan ng maraming oras para lang matutong makinig at tumigil sa pagbalewala sa mga tao lalo na kung hindi naman sila masungit. Hindi na ako babalik dito.

Ang sarap ng lasa ng manok pero, damn kailangan bang magbayad ng mga empleyado para sa sauce mula sa bulsa? Ang manok na ito ay masyadong tuyo para sa presyo!! At saka, kung hihingi ka pa ng sauce pinipilit ka nilang bumili ng extra sa isang cup na hindi pareho at tinatalo ang layunin ng pagdaragdag ng sauce habang mainit ang pagkain! Nagbibigay ako ng 1 star dahil, hindi ganito ang orihinal na paghahain ng Harold!

Hindi magsisinungaling, sumuko ako sa Harold na ito maraming taon na ang nakalipas dahil ang kalidad ng pagkain at serbisyo ay bumagsak. Ngunit ngayon nagpasya akong bigyan ito ng isa pang pagkakataon at nag-order ng 15 mga pakpak. Mahaba ang pila pero mabilis silang naglalabas-masok ng mga tao. At sa totoo lang... nag-comeback sila. Ang manok ay fye, sariwa, at malutong kung paano ko ito gusto. Kahit ang 5-year-old ko sabi ni Mama this chicken fye

Nag-order ako ng pang-apat na puti na may lamang lemon na paminta Nakatanggap ako ng parang piniritong daga na may isang bungkos ng sarsa, itong si Harolds ay talagang bumaba at kapag sinubukan mong tawagan, hindi nila kinuha ang telepono. Hindi ko irerekomenda ang lugar na ito.
Napakasarap!! Sariwa, mainit na magandang laki ng mga pakpak, magandang dami na banayad na sukat

locations.name: Chicago's Chicken Coop
locations.address: 3300 W 87th St, Chicago, IL 60652, USA
reviews: We ordered all chicken after seeing an IG post of how delicious it was. I must say I liked it, My daughter loved it, and my niece said it was just ok! They said the lady who provided the  customer service was really nice to them (they're teenagers).  They spent their own money so of course they said it was a bit pricey. Definitely will go back and order my sauce on the side (they did not scimp out on the mild sauce.) Sorry I haven't patronized this neighborhood establishment sooner! I went back recently and grabbed a shrimp dinner and it was pretty good!

Love love LOVED this place! Me and my Fiancรฉe loved our chicken tender dinners, chicken well seasoned, good fries, and the mild sauce is FIRE. Not only that, but the taffy grapes are like crack they're SO addicting! The banana pudding is to die for! Will come back again!
When I come home this usually my go to place for Chicago style chicken. I love their specials. I wish the 1 in Texas was still open but its worth the wait.

Really cool spot I like it better than Harolds chicken. There was a woman in there that was really helpful and kind. I ask for her name I believe she told me Monique. Thank you!! For all your help. A lot of times we talk about the bad and never talk about the good.

I went there on a Sunday afternoon. Not only was the food fresh and good but the service was outstanding. The young lady at the counter was so nice. Most of the time when you go to chicken spots they have attitudes and rush you while ordering. I never take it too personally but still. Even when she left for break , the cook came to take over and his attitude was great as well.

Pedimos solo pollo despuรฉs de ver una publicaciรณn en Instagram sobre lo delicioso que estaba. Debo decir que me gustรณ, a mi hija le encantรณ y mi sobrina dijo que estaba bien. Dijeron que la chica que atendiรณ fue muy amable con ellas (son adolescentes). Gastaron su propio dinero, asรญ que, por supuesto, dijeron que era un poco caro. Sin duda volverรฉ y pedirรฉ mi salsa aparte (no escatimaron en la salsa suave). ยกDisculpen no haber ido antes a este restaurante de barrio! Volvรญ hace poco y cenรฉ camarones y estaba bastante bueno.

ยกMe encantรณ este lugar! A mi prometida y a mรญ nos encantaron nuestras tiras de pollo, el pollo bien sazonado, las papas fritas deliciosas y la salsa suave es FUEGO. Y no solo eso, sino que las uvas con caramelo son increรญbles, ยกson sรบper adictivas! ยกEl pudรญn de plรกtano estรก para chuparse los dedos! ยกVolveremos!
Cuando llego a casa, este suele ser mi lugar predilecto para comer pollo al estilo Chicago. Me encantan sus especiales. Ojalรก el 1 de Texas siguiera abierto, pero vale la pena la espera.

Un lugar genial, me gusta mรกs que Harold's Chicken. Habรญa una mujer que fue muy amable y servicial. Le preguntรฉ su nombre y creo que me dijo que era Monique. ยกGracias! Por toda su ayuda. Muchas veces hablamos de lo malo y nunca de lo bueno.

Fui un domingo por la tarde. No solo la comida estaba fresca y buena, sino que el servicio fue excepcional. La chica del mostrador fue muy amable. La mayorรญa de las veces, cuando vas a restaurantes de pollo, suelen ser agresivos y te apresuran al pedir. Nunca me lo tomo demasiado a pecho, pero aun asรญ. Incluso cuando se fue a descansar, el cocinero vino a encargarse y su actitud tambiรฉn fue excelente.

Inorder namin ang lahat ng manok pagkatapos makita ang isang post sa IG kung gaano ito kasarap. Dapat kong sabihin na nagustuhan ko ito, Nagustuhan ito ng aking anak na babae, at sinabi ng aking pamangkin na ok lang ito! Mabait daw sa kanila ang babaeng nag-bigay ng customer service (mga teenager).  Sarili nilang pera ang ginastos nila kaya syempre medyo pricey daw. Tiyak na babalik at mag-order ng aking sarsa sa gilid (hindi sila nagtipid sa banayad na sarsa.) Paumanhin, hindi ko na-patronize ang kapitbahayan na ito nang mas maaga! Bumalik ako kamakailan at kumuha ng hapunan ng hipon at ito ay medyo masarap!

Love love LOVED ang lugar na ito! Nagustuhan ko at ng aking Fiancรฉe ang aming mga chicken tender dinner, chicken well seasoned, good fries, at ang mild sauce ay FIRE. Hindi lamang iyon, ngunit ang taffy grapes ay tulad ng crack ang mga ito ay SOBRANG adik! Ang banana pudding ay para mamatay! Babalik ulit!
Kapag umuuwi ako, dito kadalasan ako pumupunta para bumili ng chicken style na Chicago. Gustong-gusto ko ang mga espesyal nila. Sana bukas pa rin ang isa sa Texas pero sulit naman ang paghihintay.

Talagang cool na lugar mas gusto ko ito kaysa sa manok ng Harolds. May isang babae doon na talagang matulungin at mabait. I ask for her name I believe she told me Monique. salamat po!! Para sa lahat ng iyong tulong. Maraming beses na pinag-uusapan natin ang masama at hindi kailanman pinag-uusapan ang mabuti.

Pumunta ako doon noong Linggo ng hapon. Hindi lamang sariwa at masarap ang pagkain ngunit napakahusay ng serbisyo. Napakabait ng binibini sa counter. Most of the time pag pumupunta ka sa mga chicken spot may mga ugali sila at minamadali ka habang nag-o-order. I never take it too personally but still. Kahit na umalis siya para magpahinga, pumalit ang kusinera at maganda rin ang ugali nito.
Yah yah

Affordable at masarap!  Hindi na ako gaanong nakakapunta sa Chicago pero kapag nakarating na ako, ang Bronzeville Gap Harold's ang pinuntahan namin para sa bagong pritong Fried Chicken na may mainit na sarsa sa wonder bread!  Perpekto sa bawat oras!  At nakakakuha ako ng isang bote ng mainit na sarsa para pumunta!

Nakakapangilabot talaga ang lugar na ito. Magdadrive ako papunta sa 73th Stony Island para kunin ang manok ko mula ngayon. Ang tanga ko, nag-aaway kami sa apat na pakpak para sa heart na may mouth sauce at black pepper. Bumili ako ng steroid wings. Malamig ang panahon pagkatapos kong maghintay ng 30 minuto. Napakasama ng ugali ng may-ari. Hindi siya palakaibigan, ang husay niya sa customer service ang dahilan kung bakit walang tao sa restaurant. Tumawag ako para kausapin siya at sinabing hindi naluto nang husto ang pagkain ko, pero sabi niya wala nang refund.
Kaya sinasabi nito sa akin na wala siyang pakialam sa pagkain niya/o sa mga customer niya.
Dahil kung nagluluto ako para sa publiko at hindi sila nasiyahan. Ang pangunahing layunin ko ay masiyahan ang customer para lumago ang negosyo ko!!! At hindi pa kasama rito ang amoy (((( DIE RAT))))!!!!!!!! Paghinto ko, may dalawang binata sa likod na naninigarilyo ng marijuana. Siya pala ang nagluto at nagdala ng pagkain ko sa akin. Wala akong dalang napkin sa bag ko. NAPAKA-UNPROPESYONAL NG SERBISYO DITO!!!! IPINAPAHAYAG NIYA SA AKIN NA HINDI NILA BINIBIGAY ANG PAGMAMAHAL O PAGMAMAHAL SA PAGLULUTO NG PAGKAIN NA ITO. Gusto ko sanang i-post ang mga litrato ng pagkain ko pero nakikita kong wala siyang feature na iyon dahil ayaw niyang may makakita sa trabaho niya!!!!!! Ang lugar na ito ay talagang kakila-kilabot. Ang pagkain, pagpepresyo, serbisyo sa customer, at maging ang lokasyonโnakakatakot lahat. Nag-order kami para sa 10-piece wing special na may lemon pepper seasoning sa mga pakpak at mild sauce sa gilid. Sinabi sa amin na magiging handa ito sa loob ng 20 minuto. Pagdating namin, hindi lang nakahanda ang pagkain, nilalaglag lang nila ang fries. Nang sa wakas ay nakauwi na kami, napagtanto namin na hindi nila kasama ang mild sauce. Ang mga fries ay kulang sa luto, at ang lemon pepper seasoning ay itinapon nang hindi pantay sa isang lugar sa mga pakpak. Tumawag kami upang ipaalam sa kanila ang tungkol sa mga isyu, at ang lalaki sa telepono ay nakikipagtalo sa halip na humihingi ng tawad. Nagbayad kami ng mahigit $21 para sa 10 hindi magandang pagkakagawa ng mga pakpak at sa totoo lang, ito ay isang kumpletong pag-aaksaya. Hindi na sila makakakuha ng isa pang dolyar mula sa akin.
Hindi ka lang bukas tuwing Huwebes ng hapon ng 2pm, habang binabasa ko ang mga review na tinugon ng may-ari sa isang customer sa pamamagitan ng pag-downplay sa ibang Harold's smh.

Ilang beses akong tumawag para mag-order pero wala akong nakuhang sagot.... Pumunta doon at dalawa lang ang tao sa loob at pareho na silang nag-order.... Nakatayo ako sa bintana sa loob ng sampung minuto at ang batang babae na kumukuha ng order ay hindi kailanman lumapit sa bintanaโฆ.. sa halip ay nagpasya siyang magpatugtog ng musika sa likodโฆ. reviews:
Cashier has bad attitudes and I waited 45mins for my order rib tips and after asking about why it took a long time "fheir putting the sauce on it and that took 10mins.
While I was standing at the counter watching and waiting I couldn't help but see the" Bottle of Patron" being distributed.  SERVICE TERRIBLE !!!
The rib tips okay sauce greasy

I called in on 02/11/26 @ 15:45 the lady answered the call then asked me to hold not more that 2min I heard the lady tell someone โ I think we have a nut job on the lineโ. Then she hung up the phone.  To me customer service is everything, plz stop being rude to the people who are patronizing your business. In conclusion, I walked across the street to chicken coop with the service was much better your loss but I guess you donโt care.

This is a sleeper Harolds. Not too many people realize how good this location is which is great because not as crowded as some of the other Harolds. When you tell them fried hard they fry your chicken hard. Would give them 5 stars but they still only doing cash payments which is old school but the food here is great.

This restaurant by the edible arrangement by 87th & Kedzie was horrible. My family is sick because the worker didn't "feel" like taking our order so the chicken was half done and the sauce was not portioned right on the ENTIRE MEAL. I don't usually leave these reviews but if you don't like your job find a new one. This is a business. Leave your "feelings" at the door or go to therapy. One of the WORST $55 I spent. I do not recommend going here at all. In stead of opening more franchises let's train on customer service and company value. Have a good one. Oh and I want a refund as well!

Every time we stop by at the Dunkin donuts next door we're always saying we're going to try this place. We ordered a 8 piece mixed with lemon pepper and hot sauce on the side. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough for me to want to order again but next time I will order ahead of time.

El cajero tiene mala actitud y esperรฉ 45 minutos por mi pedido de costillas. Despuรฉs de preguntar por quรฉ tardaban tanto en ponerles la salsa, tardรณ 10 minutos.
Mientras esperaba en el mostrador, no pude evitar ver cรณmo distribuรญan la "Botella de Patrรณn". ยกยกยกPรSIMO SERVICIO!!!
Las costillas estaban bien, la salsa estaba grasosa.

Llamรฉ el 26/11/2026 a las 15:45. La seรฑora contestรณ la llamada y me pidiรณ que esperara no mรกs de dos minutos. La escuchรฉ decir a alguien: "Creo que tenemos a un loco al telรฉfono". Luego colgรณ. Para mรญ, la atenciรณn al cliente lo es todo. Por favor, dejen de ser groseros con quienes frecuentan su negocio. En resumen, crucรฉ la calle para ir a Chicken Coop y el servicio fue mucho mejor. Usted se lo perdiรณ, pero supongo que no le importa.

Este Harolds es una joya escondida. No mucha gente se da cuenta de lo bueno que es este local, lo cual es genial porque no estรก tan lleno como otros Harolds. Si pides el pollo bien frito, ยกlo frรญen bien! Les darรญa 5 estrellas, pero siguen aceptando solo efectivo, lo cual es un poco anticuado, pero la comida es buenรญsima.

Este restaurante de The Edible Arrangement en la esquina de la 87 y Kedzie fue horrible. Mi familia se enfermรณ porque el empleado no tenรญa ganas de tomar nuestro pedido, asรญ que el pollo estaba medio crudo y la salsa no estaba bien servida en toda la comida. Normalmente no dejo reseรฑas, pero si no te gusta tu trabajo, busca otro. Esto es un negocio. Deja tus "sentimientos" en la puerta o ve a terapia. Uno de los peores 55 dรณlares que he gastado. No recomiendo ir para nada. En lugar de abrir mรกs franquicias, capaciten a su personal en atenciรณn al cliente y valores empresariales. Que tengan un buen dรญa. ยกAh, y tambiรฉn quiero un reembolso!

Cada vez que pasamos por el Dunkin' Donuts de al lado, siempre decimos que vamos a probar este lugar. Pedimos un plato de 8 piezas con limรณn, pimienta y salsa picante aparte. Esperamos unos 30 minutos, lo cual me parece excesivo para un plato de 8 piezas. El pollo estaba tan bueno que me dieron ganas de volver a pedir, pero la prรณxima vez pedirรฉ con antelaciรณn.

Masama ang ugali ng cashier at naghintay ako ng 45mins para sa aking order rib tips at pagkatapos magtanong kung bakit ang tagal "fheir put the sauce on it and that took 10mins.

Ang rib tips okay sauce mamantika

Tumawag ako noong 02/11/26, alas-3:45 ng hapon. Sinagot ng babae ang tawag at saka ako pinahintay nang hindi hihigit sa 2 minuto. Narinig ko ang babae na nagsabi sa isang tao, "Sa tingin ko ay may kalokohan tayo sa linya." Pagkatapos ay ibinaba niya ang telepono. Para sa akin, ang customer service ang pinakamahalaga, pakiusap, tigilan mo na ang pagiging bastos sa mga taong namimilit sa iyo. Bilang konklusyon, naglakad ako patawid ng kalye papunta sa manukan at mas maganda ang serbisyo, ikaw ang may kasalanan, pero sa palagay ko ay wala kang pakialam.

Natutulog itong si Harolds. Hindi masyadong maraming tao ang nakakaalam kung gaano kaganda ang lokasyong ito na napakaganda dahil hindi kasing sikip ng ilan sa iba pang Harolds. Kapag sinabi mong pinirito nang husto ay piniprito nila ng husto ang manok mo. Would give them 5 stars but they still doing only cash payments which is old school pero ang sarap ng pagkain dito.

Ang restaurant na ito sa pamamagitan ng edible arrangement ni 87th & Kedzie ay kakila-kilabot. Ang aking pamilya ay may sakit dahil ang manggagawa ay hindi "naramdaman" na kunin ang aming order kaya ang manok ay kalahating tapos at ang sauce ay hindi nahati sa BUONG PAGKAIN. Hindi ko karaniwang iniiwan ang mga review na ito ngunit kung hindi mo gusto ang iyong trabaho maghanap ng bago. Ito ay isang negosyo. Iwanan ang iyong "mga damdamin" sa pintuan o pumunta sa therapy. Isa sa PINAKAMAHUSAY na $55 na ginastos ko. Hindi ko inirerekumenda ang pagpunta dito. Sa halip na magbukas ng mas maraming prangkisa, sanayin natin ang serbisyo sa customer at halaga ng kumpanya. Magkaroon ng magandang isa. Oh at gusto ko rin ng refund!

Tuwing dumaan kami sa Dunkin donuts sa tabi namin lagi naming sinasabi na susubukan namin ang lugar na ito. Umorder kami ng 8 piraso na may halong lemon pepper at mainit na sarsa sa gilid. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough para gusto kong umorder ulit pero next time mauuna na ako.

Food was on point. You get everything you are supposed to get for a wing dinner. (Chicken, crinkle fries, bread and coleslaw) They put a good amount of sauce nothing is left dry. Chicken was fresh! Excellent portion size. I will be returning. Also exceptional customer service. Thank you for doing order number 34 on 9/7/25 the way itโs supposed to be done! I will be back. If it were not for the couple chicken wings that didn't really look like wings, the food is great! I bought an 8 Wing but only 6 of them were completely edible. Those 6 wings though were cooked to perfection. Seasoned just right. I wish all plates looked like a plate they would personally eat.

Food is very good here it's my go to place now for Harold's Chicken the best on the Southeast of Chicago on 98th and Torrence. The service is wonderful very polite not just saying this , if it wasn't I would say so. Theresa Jackson

Ang sarap talaga nitong Harold's! Kapag nag-oorder ako online, laging sariwa at mainit pagdating ko. Maganda rin ang serbisyo.

Sa mga nakaraang araw, hindi ko alam kung ano ang nangyayari sa website, ilang linggo na itong hindi gumagana.

Tuwing papasok ako dito, maganda ang karanasan ko! Kakalipat lang pabalik sa lungsod At sa una ay hindi pumupunta dito dahil sa lokasyon nito. Nagkataon lang na dumating ako isang araw at napakasaya ko. Isa itong matandang babae dito. Siya ay napakabait at palaging magiliw. Pagdating ko dito, pumupunta ako para sa dalawa at kung minsan ay tatlong magkakaibang bahay. Ang aking pagkain ay palaging sariwa at mabilis. So proud of my Black people๐ช๐พ๐๐ Woord of advice, order online

Nasa punto ang pagkain. Makukuha mo ang lahat ng dapat mong makuha para sa isang wing dinner. (Chicken, crinkle fries, bread and coleslaw) Naglagay sila ng sapat na dami ng sarsa walang natitirang tuyo. Sariwa ang manok! Napakahusay na laki ng bahagi. babalik ako. Pambihirang serbisyo sa customer din. Salamat sa paggawa ng order number 34 noong 9/7/25 sa paraang dapat gawin! babalik ako. Papuri sa inyong lahat, para akong pamilya.

Kung hindi dahil sa couple chicken wings na hindi naman talaga mukhang pakpak, ang sarap ng pagkain! Bumili ako ng 8 Wing pero 6 lang ang ganap na nakakain. Ang 6 na pakpak na iyon ay niluto sa pagiging perpekto. Timplahan ng tama. Sana lahat ng plato ay parang plato na personal nilang kakainin.

Napakasarap ng pagkain dito, ito ang pinupuntahan ko ngayon para sa Harold's Chicken, ang pinakamasarap sa Timog-Silangang Chicago sa 98th at Torrence. Napakaganda ng serbisyo, napakagalang, hindi lang basta sinasabi ito, kung hindi, sasabihin ko na rin. Theresa Jackson
